questions.question: Newton's First Law of Motion states:

answers.b: An object remains at rest or in motion unless acted upon by a force
answers.c: For every action there is an equal and opposite reaction
answers.d: Energy cannot be created or destroyed

questions.feedback: Newton's First Law describes inertia - objects maintain their state of motion unless acted upon by a force.
